author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
# Summary of the new feature/enhancement

We have closed on stylecop rules.  We should runa code formatter on the code base to apply the single style and immediately enable code formatting in CI so style is no longer a PR review discussion.

Try formulating it in user story style (if applicable):
'As a user I want X so that Y.' with X being the being the action and Y being the value of the action.
-->

# Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

<!--

Consider providing an example PowerShell experience with expected result.
-->

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
We did run CodeFormatter over all code base. It do not fix all that we need.
The CodeFormatter is extensible but there is no activity in its repo (Core team is owner).

title: Feature Request: Enable code style formatting in CI
